name: Vacation with Ross and Mr.Receptionist
description:
Vacation with Mr.Receptionist and Ross is a sequel to another BL called Disillusioned Reunion. The prequel is free, but you don't have to play that to enjoy this story.

Prequel link: https://chanimk.itch.io/disillusioned-reunion

Ross discovers that his friend, Aries, hasn't been on a vacation in a long time. After convincing him, Ross manages to bring him to a beach resort. There they meet a very hospitable receptionist who wants to make sure their stay goes well.

Will you make Aries' and Ross' bond stronger during this trip? Or will you make Aries end up with the charming receptionist instead?

-3 Endings

-15K words

-14 CGs

-No sex scenes, guys XD

Credits to Dova Syndrome(https://dova-s.jp/) for Music and Zapsplat(https://www.zapsplat.com/) for Sound Effects.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/ChaniMK_VN
